title: The Myth Hunters by Christopher Golden (The Veil #1)
description:
In this enthralling new tale from bestselling author Christopher Golden, one man is drawn into a realm just across the veil from our own, where every captivating myth and fairy tale is true, the vanished existÃ¢â‚¬â€œand every fear is foundedÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.

Yielding to his father's wishes, Oliver Bascombe abandoned his dream of being an actor and joined the family law firm. Now he will marry a lovely young woman bearing the Bascombe stamp of approval. But on the eve of his wedding, a blizzard sweeps inÃ¢â‚¬â€œbringing with it an icy legend who calls into question everything Oliver believes about the world and his place in itÃ¢â‚¬Â¦.

Pursued by a murderous creature who heeds no boundaries, Jack Frost needs Oliver's help to save both himself and his worldÃ¢â‚¬â€œan alternate reality slowly being displaced by our own. To help him, Oliver Bascombe, attorney-at-law, will have to become Oliver Bascombe, adventurer, heroÃ¢â‚¬â€œand hunted. So begins a magnificent journey where he straddles two realitiesÃ¢â‚¬Â¦and where, even amid danger, Oliver finds freedom for the very first time.

Genre: Fantasy
